revised_title: Uncommon Mineral Substances Found in Coal and Iron-Mines of England
tldr: The author describes two uncommon mineral substances found in coal and iron-mines of England. One substance is a bituminous substance that is very inflammable and has a color similar to aloes. The other substance is a white, sweetish liquid found in iron-stone. These substances are of interest to naturalists and may have potential uses in various industries.
